#summary Instructions for version upgrades
#labels Featured

= Upgrading =

From 2.0 on, the general upgrade process is to download the SubEtha distribution, unzip it, and copy *se.war* to ${RESIN_HOME}/webapps.  Some specific version upgrades listed here in this file will have additional instructions.

== 1.x -> 2.0 ==

Two columns were renamed in the database schema but no other changes were made.
 * Mail.fromField -> Mail.sender
 * Mail.envelopeSender -> Mail.senderNormal

Script for MySQL:

{{{
  ALTER TABLE Mail CHANGE fromField sender TEXT;
  ALTER TABLE Mail CHANGE envelopeSender senderNormal TEXT NOT NULL;
}}}
